title: Scenario: Verifiy all images that appear on login screen are clear and readable on both retina and non-retina devices
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the login popover on a retina and non-retina screen
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the images clearly on both screen types
AND the images will be readable with no spelling or grammatical errors

title: Scenario: User taps 'Login' button without entering an email or password
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps 'Login' button without entering an email or password
custom_expected:
THEN the user should should get an appropriate error message
AND the error message should be clear and free of grammatical errors

title: Scenario: User taps 'Login' button after entering an incorrect email and password combination
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps 'Login' button after entering an incorrect email and password combination
custom_expected:
THEN the user should should get an appropriate error message
AND the error message should be clear and free of grammatical errors

title: Scenario: User taps 'Login' button after entering an invalid email or password
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps 'Login' button after entering an invalid email or password
custom_expected:
THEN the user should should get an appropriate error message
AND the error message should be clear and free of grammatical errors

title: Scenario: User logs in with MLB.TV basic monthly account
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs in with a valid MLB.TV basic monthly account
custom_expected:
THEN the user should gain access to the application
AND the user should be able to watch MLB.tv home streams only without issue
AND the user should be able to listen to all Gameday audio streams

custom_expected:
THEN the user should gain access to the application

title: Scenario: User logs in with MLB.TV premium monthly account

custom_expected:
THEN the user should gain access to the application
AND the user should be able to watch MLB.tv home AND away streams without issue
AND the user should be able to listen to all Gameday audio streams

title: Scenario: User logs in with MLB.TV premium annual account
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs in with a valid MLB.TV premium annual account
custom_expected:
THEN the user should gain access to the application
AND the user should be able to watch MLB.tv home AND away streams without issue
AND the user should be able to listen to all Gameday audio streams

title: Scenario: User logs in with Gameday Audio account
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs in with a valid Gameday Audio account
custom_expected:
THEN the user should gain access to the application
AND the user should be able to listen to Gameday Audio streams only
AND the user should not be able to watch MLB.tv streams

title: Scenario: User logs in with At Bat entitled account
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs in with a valid At Bat entitled account
custom_expected:
THEN the user should gain access to the application
AND the user should be able to listen to Gameday Audio streams only
AND the user should not be able to watch MLB.tv streams

title: Scenario: User logs in with At Bat + MLB.TV basic entitled account
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs in with a valid At Bat + MLB.TV basic entitled account
custom_expected:
THEN the user should gain access to the application
AND the user should be able to watch MLB.tv home streams only without issue
AND the user should be able to listen to all Gameday audio streams

title: Scenario: User logs in with an account that has no entitlements
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs in with an account that has no entitlements
custom_expected:
THEN the user should should get an appropriate error message
AND the error message should be clear and free of grammatical errors

title: Scenario: Verify changing a users account email will throw a validation error when the user tries to login to the account next
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have changed the users account email on the MLB.com website
AND the user has accessed the Login popover
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters their previous credentials
custom_expected: THEN they will receive a validation error message

title: Scenario: Verify changing a users account password will throw a validation error when the user tries to login to the account next
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have changed the users account password on the MLB.com website
AND the user has accessed the Login popover
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters their credentials
custom_expected: THEN they will receive a validation error message

title: Scenario: Verify if the user already has stored credentials and the account password or email address is changed that the user will be thrown a validation message the next time they try to access the account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have stored the user credentials already
AND we have changed the user credentials on the MLB.com website
AND we have selected MLB.com Account
custom_steps: WHEN the password or email address are changed on the account
custom_expected: THEN the user will be prompted with a validation error that the credentials are no longer valid

title: Scenario: All setting changes are preserved when application is quit and relaunched
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND has opened the File menu bar option 
AND has selected preferences
custom_steps:
WHEN we change any of the Settings
AND we quit the application
AND we open the application
custom_expected: THEN the settings changes made are still preserved

title: Scenario: User leaves 'Remember Me' unchecked
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs into the app with valid MLB.com credentials
AND the user leaves 'Remember Me' unchecked
custom_expected:
THEN the users credentials will not be stored
AND when the user quits/relaunches the app they will have to enter their credentials again

title: Scenario: User leaves 'Remember Me' checked
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs into the app with valid MLB.com credentials
AND the user leaves 'Remember Me' checked
custom_expected:
THEN the users credentials will be stored
AND when the user quits/relaunches the app they will not have to enter their credentials again

title: Scenario: User taps 'Forgot your password?' link below email and password fields
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed the login popover for MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps 'Forgot your password?' link below email and password fields
custom_expected:
THEN the corresponding 'Forgot your password?' flow will load
AND the page will be free of any spelling or grammatical errors
AND the user will be able to return to the login popover from this page

custom_expected:

AND the page will be free of any spelling or grammatical errors
AND the user will be able to return to the login popover from this page

title: Scenario: MLB.com Account Forgot Password Click Send with No Email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Settings menu has been accessed
AND the MLB.com Account was opened
AND the Forgot Password link was tapped
AND the Send Password link is on screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the Email field is left blank
AND the Send button is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the user will be prompted by an "Enter Email address." message in red typeface above the Email field

title: Scenario: MLB.com Account Forgot Password - Send Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Settings menu has been accessed
AND MLB.com Account has been opened
AND no account credentials are currently stored
AND Forgot Password is tapped 
AND the Send Password screen is up
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a valid email address
AND taps the Send button
custom_expected: THEN the user will be prompted by a "New Password Sent" message in red typeface above the Email field

title: Scenario: MLB.com Account Retrieving Sent Password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has begun the Forgot Password flow in the Settings menu
AND has received the "New Password Sent" message
custom_steps: WHEN the mailbox for the associated Bamnet account is accessed
custom_expected:
THEN an email with the following text will be received:

"Your password has been reset. 
Your reset password is: xxxxxxxx (this is will be determined at the time of sending)

Thank You,
MLB.com Customer Support

title: Scenario: Successful Log In Using Reset Password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has successfully initiated the Forgot Password flow in the Settings menu
AND has retrieved the reset password from Email
custom_steps:
WHEN Settings is accessed
AND MLB.com Account is tapped 
AND the Email field is populated
AND the Password field is populated with the reset password contained in the email
AND the OK button is tapped
custom_expected:
THEN the account credentials will be successfully validated
AND the associated email address will be visible below MLB.com Account in the Settings menu
